mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (title, author_id, location, description, participants, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, all_day) VALUES (#{title}, #{authorId}, #{location}, #{description}, #{participants, typeHandler=com.ohih.scheduler.config.typehandler.ListTypeHandler}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{allDay})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, author_id AS authorId, location, description, participants, status, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, all_day AS allDay, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM events WHERE start_date >= #{startOfMonth} AND end_date <= #{endOfMonth}
